title: Afghan Aubergine (Borani Banjan) With Saucy Spiced Lentils, Garlic Yoghurt, Fresh Mint & Pillowy Flatbreads

steps.raw_text: Chop onion and garlic, measure spices
steps.label: Chop onion and garlic, measure spices
steps.notes: Inferred for the lentil sauce base. Can be done while aubergine roasts.

steps.label: Slice aubergine
steps.notes: Inferred from 'Crispy roasted aubergine'. The stated 'Prep time 1' is very short for all prep, so this is an estimate.

steps.label: Chop fresh mint
steps.notes: Inferred for the fresh mint topping.

steps.label: Mix yoghurt, garlic, and lemon
steps.notes: Inferred for the garlic yoghurt topping. Ingredients include: soy yoghurt, lemon, garlic.

steps.label: Preheat oven to 200°C
steps.notes: Inferred for roasting aubergine. Assuming a quick preheat to fit total time.

steps.label: Heat flatbreads
steps.notes: Inferred for serving with flatbreads. Best done towards the end of cooking.

steps.label: Sauté onion, garlic, and spices
steps.notes: Inferred for building the sauce.

steps.label: Roast aubergine until crispy
steps.notes: Adjusted duration to fit the stated 'Total time 20' minutes. This is the main cooking step.

steps.raw_text: Add lentils, tomato, and sauce ingredients; simmer
steps.label: Add lentils, tomato, and sauce ingredients; simmer
steps.notes: Inferred for the lentil sauce. Assumes quick-cook or canned lentils to fit the total time. Ingredients include: black lentils, tomato, balsamic vinegar, soy sauce, agave nectar, tomato puree, sea salt, paprika, cumin, coriander, fennel, chilli, cinnamon, allspice.

steps.label: Assemble and serve
steps.notes: Serve roasted aubergine over lentil sauce, topped with garlic yoghurt and mint, with flatbreads.

title: Tandoori Tofu Naan Wraps With Cooling Mint Yoghurt, Pickled Red Cabbage & Fresh Spinach

steps.label: Prepare Pickled Red Cabbage
steps.notes: Thinly slice red onion/cabbage and prepare a quick pickle with red wine vinegar, water, sugar, mustard seeds, fennel seeds, and coriander seeds.

steps.label: Preheat Oven
steps.notes: Preheat oven to 200°C for roasting the tofu.

steps.label: Cut Tofu into Bites
steps.notes: Dice or cube tofu into bite-sized pieces.

steps.label: Prepare Mint Yoghurt
steps.notes: Chop fresh mint and mix with oat yoghurt for the cooling sauce.

steps.label: Wash and Prep Spinach
steps.notes: Rinse and prepare fresh spinach leaves.

steps.label: Prepare Tandoori Marinade
steps.notes: Mix garlic, ginger, lemon juice, and spices (paprika, cumin, cayenne, coriander, turmeric, maple syrup, salt) for the tandoori marinade.

steps.label: Marinate Tofu
steps.notes: Toss tofu in the prepared tandoori marinade. An estimated 15 minutes is used for marination, though longer is possible.

steps.label: Roast Tofu
steps.notes: Spread marinated tofu on a baking sheet and roast in the preheated oven until charred.

steps.label: Warm Naan
steps.notes: Warm the garlic and herb naan bread until soft and pliable. This can be done in the oven during the last few minutes of tofu roasting or immediately after.

steps.label: Assemble Wraps
steps.notes: Fill warm naan with roasted tandoori tofu, cooling mint yoghurt, tangy pickled red cabbage, and fresh spinach.

title: Creamy Kimchi Macaroni With Roasted Broccoli & Garlic Panko Breadcrumbs

steps.label: General Prep
steps.notes: Take out all ingredients and rinse any raw grains, herbs or vegetables.

steps.label: Preheat Oven
steps.notes: Preheat to 200°C (180°C fan).

steps.label: Chop Spring Onion
steps.notes: Finely chop spring onion, keep white half separate from green.

steps.label: Chop Kimchi
steps.notes: Chop vegan kimchi into smaller bite-sized pieces. Keep the juices.

steps.label: Boil Macaroni Pasta
steps.notes: Pour boiling water into saucepan, add macaroni pasta, salt water well. Boil for 8 minutes or until al dente.

steps.label: Dry Fry Garlic Breadcrumbs
steps.notes: Place frying pan over medium heat, dry fry (without oil) until lightly toasted.

steps.label: Prepare Broccoli for Roasting
steps.notes: Cut into bite-sized pieces, lay on tray, drizzle with olive oil, season.

steps.label: Scoop Pasta Water & Drain Macaroni
steps.notes: Scoop out a mug of pasta water, then drain and return the pasta to the pan.

steps.label: Roast Broccoli
steps.notes: Roast for 10-15 mins until golden, tossing once. Using midpoint duration.

steps.label: Combine Macaroni with Sauce & Kimchi
steps.notes: Add gochujang 'cheese' sauce, spring onion whites, and kimchi to the pot with the macaroni and stir to heat through.

steps.label: Adjust Sauce Consistency
steps.notes: Add a few splashes of reserved pasta water as needed to make the sauce silky.

steps.label: Add Roasted Broccoli to Macaroni
steps.notes: Add the cooked broccoli and stir again until just combined.

steps.label: Ladle Macaroni into Bowls
steps.notes: Ladle the creamy macaroni into bowls.

steps.label: Garnish Macaroni
steps.notes: Top with the crispy garlic breadcrumbs and the spring onion greens.

title: Peanut Butter Curry With Charred Red Peppers, Sugar Snap Peas, Lime & Toasted Peanuts

steps.label: Prepare Potatoes & Sugar Snap Peas
steps.notes: Peel/chop new potatoes, trim sugar snap peas.

steps.label: Toast Peanuts
steps.notes: Inferred from 'toasted crushed peanuts'. Assumed dry pan toasting.

steps.label: Prepare Curry Aromatics
steps.notes: Chop/mince lemongrass, garlic, ginger, and measure spices (cumin, coriander, cloves, cinnamon, nutmeg).

steps.label: Char Red Peppers
steps.notes: Inferred from 'charred red peppers'. Assumed oven broiler for charring. Peel and chop after charring (implied).

steps.label: Cook Basmati Rice
steps.notes: Assumed standard rice cooking time.

steps.label: Crush Toasted Peanuts
steps.notes: Requires peanuts to be toasted first.

steps.label: Sauté Curry Aromatics
steps.notes: Sauté prepared lemongrass, garlic, ginger, and spices.

steps.label: Simmer Curry Base
steps.notes: Add coconut milk, water, vegan bouillon, peanut butter, and soy sauce. Simmer gently to combine flavors.

steps.label: Add Vegetables to Curry
steps.notes: Add prepared potatoes, sugar snap peas, and charred red peppers. Cook until potatoes are tender.

steps.label: Squeeze Fresh Lime
steps.notes: Added just before serving for freshness.

steps.label: Serve Curry with Rice & Toppings
steps.notes: Plate curry with basmati rice, topped with crushed peanuts and a lime wedge.

title: Tahini Miso Ramen With Crispy Chilli Tempeh, Pak Choi & Flat Rice Noodles

steps.label: Take out all ingredients
steps.notes: Gather all necessary ingredients before starting.

steps.label: Gather cooking equipment
steps.notes: Take out a large frying pan and two saucepans.

steps.label: Rinse raw ingredients
steps.notes: Rinse any raw grains, herbs, or vegetables.

steps.label: Crumble tempeh
steps.notes: Crumble tempeh with hands until minced.

steps.label: Remove pak choi leaves
steps.notes: Remove pak choi leaves from the base of the stem.

steps.label: Dice chilli and spring onions
steps.notes: Finely dice chilli and spring onions (including green bits).

steps.label: Heat frying pan with oil
steps.notes: Place frying pan over high heat and add a generous drizzle of oil.

steps.label: Prepare water for noodles
steps.notes: Pour boiling water from kettle into first saucepan and place over medium-high heat.

steps.label: Prepare miso tahini broth
steps.notes: Pour miso tahini broth into other saucepan and add 300ml of water.

steps.label: Fry tempeh
steps.notes: Add crumbled tempeh and fry until crispy.

steps.label: Cook flat rice noodles
steps.notes: Cook for 4-5 minutes or until tender but al dente. Keep checking as rice noodles can be easily overcooked.

steps.label: Heat and simmer broth
steps.notes: Place over medium-high heat and bring to a boil, then reduce to a light simmer until ready to serve.

steps.raw_text: Stir in black bean rayu and keep warm
steps.label: Stir in black bean rayu and keep warm
steps.notes: Stir through half of the black bean rayu, then remove from pan and keep warm.

steps.label: Drain and rinse noodles
steps.notes: Drain and rinse well under cold running water, then leave in a colander to drain.

steps.label: Clean frying pan
steps.notes: Wipe clean the same frying pan used for tempeh.

steps.label: Cook pak choi
steps.notes: Add pak choi and cook until tender. This can be done while serving.

steps.raw_text: Top with pak choi and tempeh
steps.label: Top with pak choi and tempeh
Garnish ramen
steps.notes: Garnish with chilli, spring onions, and a drizzle of remaining black bean rayu.

title: Adobo Black Bean Tostadas With Shredded Lettuce, Lime Cashew Crema, Avocado & Salsa Macha

steps.label: Slice avocado
steps.notes: De-stone and cut into thin slices. Option to fan for presentation.

steps.label: Preheat oven
steps.notes: Preheat oven to 200°C / 180°C fan.

steps.label: Shred lettuce
steps.notes: Finely shred the baby gem by cutting horizontally across the head.

steps.label: Take out and rinse ingredients
steps.notes: Take out all ingredients and rinse any raw grains, herbs, or vegetables.

steps.raw_text: Warm black beans with adobo sauce
steps.label: Warm black beans with adobo sauce
steps.notes: Place over medium heat and warm through, stirring occasionally, until piping hot. Add a splash of water if it starts to stick.

steps.label: Bake tostadas
steps.notes: Pop tacos onto a baking tray and bake for 8 minutes or until crispy, flipping halfway. This is the healthier, oil-free version.

steps.raw_text: Mash half of the black beans
steps.label: Mash half of the black beans
steps.notes: Roughly mash around half of the beans with a fork and set aside.

steps.label: Assemble tostadas
steps.notes: Layer black beans, shredded lettuce, cashew crema, avocado slices, and salsa macha. Finish with a squeeze of fresh lime juice.

title: Mushroom Birria Tacos With Melted Vegan Mozzarella, Onion Salsa & Rich Dipping Consommé

steps.label: Sauté aromatics for consommé
steps.notes: Sauté red onion and garlic until softened and fragrant.

steps.label: Shred oyster mushrooms
steps.notes: Shred oyster mushrooms into bite-sized pieces, mimicking pulled meat texture.

steps.label: Prepare onion, coriander, lime salsa
steps.notes: Finely chop white onion and coriander, then mix with fresh lime juice to create a vibrant salsa.

steps.label: Rehydrate dried chillies
steps.notes: Rehydrate chipotle, chilli de arbol, and guajillo chillies in hot water until softened.

steps.label: Warm tortillas
steps.notes: Warm corn tortillas until pliable and slightly toasted.

steps.label: Blend consommé base
steps.notes: Blend rehydrated chillies, sautéed aromatics, tomato puree, vegan bouillon, and spices (cloves, cumin, oregano, cinnamon, allspice, bay leaf) with water until smooth.

steps.label: Simmer consommé
steps.notes: Slow-cook the blended consommé base to develop rich, deep flavors. This will be used for mushroom marinade and dipping.

steps.label: Marinate shredded mushrooms
steps.notes: Marinate shredded mushrooms in a portion of the finished consommé for flavor absorption.

steps.label: Cook marinated mushrooms
steps.notes: Sauté or cook the marinated mushrooms until tender and slightly browned.

steps.label: Assemble birria tacos
steps.notes: Dip warm tortillas in the consommé, then fill with cooked mushrooms and vegan mozzarella.

steps.label: Fry birria tacos
steps.notes: Fry the assembled tacos until crispy and the vegan mozzarella is melted and gooey.

steps.label: Serve birria tacos
steps.notes: Serve the fried birria tacos immediately with the fresh onion salsa and a side of warm consommé for dipping.

title: Kimchi Miso Nourish Bowl With Farro, Charred Purple Sprouting Broccoli & Pak Choi

steps.label: Prepare miso dressing
steps.notes: Inferred from 'umami-rich miso dressing'.

steps.raw_text: Cook purple sprouting broccoli, pak choi & peas

steps.notes: Inferred from 'cooked until tender' and 'charred' in the title. Assumed pan-frying for charring.

steps.label: Chop kimchi
steps.notes: Inferred from 'tangy chopped kimchi'.

steps.label: Cook farro
steps.notes: Farro is a key grain mentioned as a healthy swap. Assumed standard cooking method.

steps.label: Slice spring onion & red chilli
steps.notes: Inferred from 'freshened up with sliced spring onion and red chilli'.

steps.label: Assemble nourish bowl
steps.notes: All components are tossed together for the final dish.

title: Sweet & Smoky Butter Bean Shakshuka With Whipped Tahini, Toasted Dukkah & Soft Garlic Flatbread

steps.label: De-stem and slice red pepper
steps.notes: Cut into 1cm slices.

steps.raw_text: Heat oil in large frying pan
steps.label: Heat oil in large frying pan
steps.notes: Place over a medium-high heat and add a drizzle of oil.

steps.label: Warm flatbreads by dry frying
steps.notes: Dry fry (without oil) on both sides for 30-60 seconds or until lightly toasted. Alternatively, bake or grill in the oven.

steps.label: Pick and chop parsley
steps.notes: Finely chop.

steps.raw_text: Fry sliced peppers until charred and tender
steps.label: Fry sliced peppers until charred and tender
steps.notes: Fry until lightly charred on the outside and starting to go tender.

steps.raw_text: Add shakshuka sauce and drained butter beans
steps.label: Add shakshuka sauce and drained butter beans
steps.notes: Reduce heat to medium before adding.

steps.label: Simmer shakshuka until piping hot
steps.notes: Cook for 4-5 minutes. Add water as needed if it reduces too much or starts to stick.

steps.label: Serve shakshuka
steps.notes: Divide shakshuka, drizzle over whipped tahini, and scatter over dukkah and fresh parsley. Use warm flatbread to scoop.

title: Sticky Teriyaki Tofu Bowl With Purple Sprouting Broccoli & Pickled Cabbage Over Sushi Rice

steps.label: Tear tofu into chunks
steps.notes: Tear into bite-sized chunks with hands.

steps.label: Gather equipment
steps.notes: Take out two frying pans and a saucepan.

steps.label: Finely slice spring onion
steps.notes: Slice while other ingredients cook.

steps.label: Shake teriyaki sauce pouch
steps.notes: Shake well in case cornflour has separated.

steps.raw_text: Heat oil in two frying pans
steps.label: Heat oil in two frying pans
steps.notes: Heat a drizzle of oil in each pan over a medium heat.

steps.label: Add water to sushi rice
steps.notes: Pour 2.5x rice volume in water from kettle.

steps.raw_text: Fry tofu until golden and crispy
steps.label: Fry tofu until golden and crispy
steps.notes: Add tofu to one frying pan and fry for around 10 minutes.

steps.label: Fry purple sprouting broccoli
steps.notes: Add broccoli to the other pan and fry on all sides until tender but al dente.

steps.raw_text: Remove fried tofu and set aside
steps.label: Remove fried tofu and set aside
Season broccoli
steps.notes: Season to taste with salt and pepper.

steps.label: Chop broccoli into bite-sized pieces (optional)
steps.notes: Optional, before serving.

steps.label: Simmer sushi rice
steps.notes: Reduce heat to low, cover and cook for 8-10 minutes or until tender but al dente.

steps.label: Thicken teriyaki sauce
steps.notes: Add teriyaki sauce to the pan and cook until thickened (1-2 minutes).

steps.raw_text: Divide rice, broccoli, and pickled cabbage into bowls
steps.label: Divide rice, broccoli, and pickled cabbage into bowls
Coat tofu in teriyaki sauce
steps.notes: Take pan off heat, add crispy tofu back and stir until well coated.

steps.raw_text: Top with teriyaki tofu and extra sauce
steps.label: Top with teriyaki tofu and extra sauce
steps.notes: Spoon over any extra sauce.

steps.raw_text: Garnish with spring onion and sesame seeds
steps.label: Garnish with spring onion and sesame seeds

title: Crispy Courgette & Sweetcorn Fritters With Garlic & Dill Yoghurt and Sweet Cucumber Pickle

steps.label: Chop spring onions for fritters
steps.notes: Chop spring onions for the fritter batter.

steps.label: Slice cucumber for pickle
steps.notes: Prepare cucumber for the sweet cucumber pickle.

steps.label: Mix dry fritter ingredients
steps.notes: Combine gluten free flour, sweet smoked paprika, ground garlic, chilli flakes, baking powder, brown mustard seeds, and sea salt.

steps.label: Grate courgette for fritters
steps.notes: Grate courgette for the fritter batter.

steps.label: Prepare pickle brine
steps.notes: Mix rice vinegar, raw natural cane sugar, sea salt, and water for the pickle brine.

steps.label: Chop fresh dill
steps.notes: Chop dill for the garlic & dill yoghurt.

steps.label: Combine wet fritter ingredients
steps.notes: Combine grated courgette, sweetcorn, and chopped spring onions.

steps.label: Combine cucumber and brine
steps.notes: Combine sliced cucumber with the prepared brine. Allow to sit.

steps.label: Mix garlic & dill yoghurt
steps.notes: Combine soy yoghurt, ground garlic, and chopped dill.

steps.label: Make fritter batter
steps.notes: Combine the wet and dry fritter ingredients to form a batter.

steps.label: Heat oil in frying pan
steps.notes: Heat cooking oil in a frying pan over medium-high heat.

steps.label: Cook fritters
steps.notes: Spoon batter into the hot pan and cook until crispy and golden brown on both sides. Cook in batches if necessary.

steps.label: Serve fritters with accompaniments
steps.notes: Serve the crispy courgette & sweetcorn fritters with the garlic & dill yoghurt, sweet cucumber pickle, and a squeeze of fresh lemon.

title: Crispy Mushroom Shawarma With Garlic Tahini Sauce, Pickled Radish & Fresh Mint In Soft Flatbread

steps.label: Preheat oven
steps.notes: Preheat to 220°C / 200°C fan.

steps.label: Gather ingredients
steps.notes: Take out all the ingredients for this recipe.

steps.label: Rinse raw ingredients
steps.notes: Rinse any raw grains, herbs or vegetables.

steps.label: Slice portobello mushrooms
steps.notes: Slice 0.5cm thick.

steps.label: Mix mushrooms with marinade
steps.notes: Place mushrooms in tray, pour over marinade, olive oil, salt, pepper, and mix until coated.

steps.label: Roast portobello mushrooms
steps.notes: Roast for 15 minutes or until tender.

steps.label: Warm flatbreads
steps.notes: Remove mushrooms from oven, then place flatbreads directly onto a shelf to warm through. Be careful not to overcook.

steps.label: Assemble shawarma
steps.notes: Lay out warm flatbreads, spread tahini dressing, pile on mushroom shawarma, radish pickle, and jalapeño mint salsa. Wrap up.

title: Sushi Bowl With Coconut Sesame Crusted Tofu, Edamame, Avocado & Gochujang Peanut Sauce

steps.label: Gather ingredients & Rinse produce
steps.notes: Based on 'Before you start' instruction.

steps.label: Boil kettle
steps.notes: From recipe's STEP 1.

steps.label: Take out frying pan & saucepan
steps.notes: From recipe's STEP 1.

steps.label: Peel & dress carrots
steps.notes: From recipe's STEP 3. Dress with olive oil, salt and pepper.

steps.label: Slice tofu
steps.notes: From recipe's STEP 4. 'Meanwhile, slice the tofu into 6 thin slices'.

steps.label: Slice avocado
steps.notes: From recipe's STEP 6. Cut in half, scoop out, slice thinly.

steps.label: Cook sushi rice
steps.notes: Simmer on low heat for 8-10 minutes until water absorbed. Midpoint (9 min) used for duration.

steps.label: Toast sesame coconut mix
steps.notes: From recipe's STEP 4. Fry on medium low heat for a few minutes until toasted and golden. Season to taste.

steps.label: Steam edamame
steps.notes: Place steamer over rice for final 2-3 minutes. If no steamer, add to rice for 2-3 minutes. Midpoint (2.5 min) used for duration.

steps.label: Fry tofu
steps.notes: From recipe's STEP 4. Wipe frying pan clean, add fresh oil, fry until crispy on both sides for about 2-3 minutes. Midpoint (2.5 min) used for duration.

steps.label: Crust tofu
steps.notes: From recipe's STEP 5. Spread gochujang peanut sauce onto one side of cooked tofu and press into sesame coconut mix. Repeat for remaining tofu. Save any remaining crumb for topping.

steps.label: Plate & serve sushi bowls
steps.notes: From recipe's STEP 7. Plate rice, edamame, carrot, avocado, and crispy tofu. Drizzle sauce and remaining coconut sesame mix.

title: Slow-Cooked Mushroom Bourguignon Over Creamy Mash With Green Kale

steps.raw_text: While it heats up, slice half of the chestnut mushrooms and cut the other half into quarters to add texture.
steps.label: Slice and quarter mushrooms
steps.notes: Slice half, cut other half into quarters. Duration inferred.

steps.raw_text: take out two saucepans and a frying pan.
steps.label: Take out pans
steps.notes: Duration inferred.

steps.raw_text: Peel the potatoes, then cut into 2cm cubes.
steps.label: Peel and cut potatoes
steps.notes: Cut into 2cm cubes. Duration inferred.

steps.raw_text: rinse any raw grains, herbs or vegetables.
steps.label: Rinse vegetables
steps.notes: Duration inferred.

steps.label: Boil kettle
steps.notes: Duration inferred.

steps.raw_text: Place your frying pan over a medium heat and add a drizzle of oil.
steps.label: Heat frying pan with oil
steps.notes: Duration inferred.

steps.raw_text: Fill both of your saucepans with boiling water from your kettle
steps.label: Fill saucepans with boiling water
steps.notes: Duration inferred.

steps.raw_text: Fry the mushrooms until golden and caramelised, around 10 minutes
steps.label: Fry mushrooms until golden
steps.notes: Fry until golden and caramelised. Duration: 10 minutes.

steps.raw_text: then place over a medium heat.
steps.label: Place saucepans over medium heat
steps.notes: Duration inferred.

steps.raw_text: then add the bourguignon sauce and cook for a further 2-3 minutes or until piping hot. Add water as needed if the sauce reduces too much or starts to stick.
steps.label: Cook bourguignon sauce with mushrooms
steps.notes: Cook for 2-3 minutes or until piping hot. Add water as needed. Duration range: 2-3 minutes.

steps.raw_text: Salt your boiling water, then add the potatoes to the water and cook for around 10-12 minutes or until the potato is very soft. It should virtually crumble when you jab it with a fork.
steps.label: Boil potatoes until very soft
steps.notes: Cook for 10-12 minutes or until very soft, virtually crumbles when jabbed with a fork. Duration range: 10-12 minutes.

steps.raw_text: Place the kale in your other saucepan and boil for 5-10 minutes or until al dente.
steps.label: Boil kale until al dente
steps.notes: Cook for 5-10 minutes or until al dente. Duration range: 5-10 minutes.

steps.raw_text: Season with salt and pepper to taste before serving.
steps.label: Season bourguignon sauce
steps.notes: Season with salt and pepper to taste. Duration inferred.

steps.raw_text: Once the potatoes are cooked, add a generous drizzle of extra virgin olive oil, then mash until smooth and creamy. You could also add a little plant milk or butter to make it even creamier (optional).
steps.label: Mash potatoes until smooth
steps.notes: Add generous drizzle of extra virgin olive oil. Optional: add plant milk or butter. Duration inferred.

steps.raw_text: Season well with salt and black pepper to taste.
steps.label: Season mashed potatoes
steps.notes: Season well with salt and black pepper to taste. Duration inferred.

steps.raw_text: To serve up, divide the mash between serving bowls, ladle over the mushroom bourguignon and serve alongside the kale.
steps.label: Plate mash, bourguignon, and kale
steps.notes: Duration inferred.

title: Black Bean Chilli Enchiladas Topped With Cashew Cheese Sauce & A Zingy Cherry Tomato Salsa

steps.raw_text: Before you start, take out all the ingredients for this recipe... and rinse any raw grains, herbs or vegetables.
steps.label: Take out ingredients, rinse produce
steps.notes: Inferred duration for general preparation.

steps.raw_text: Preheat your oven to 220°C / 200°C fan and take out a medium sized ovenproof dish or baking tray, around 20cm.
steps.label: Preheat oven, take out dish
steps.notes: Oven temperature 220°C / 200°C fan. Inferred duration for preheating.

steps.raw_text: Set aside around a quarter of the enchilada sauce in a small bowl or ramekin.
steps.label: Set aside enchilada sauce
steps.notes: Inferred duration.

steps.raw_text: Pour the remainder of the sauce in a larger bowl along with the black beans in their juices... Give it a good mix to make your enchilada filling.
steps.label: Mix enchilada sauce and black beans
steps.notes: Inferred duration.

steps.raw_text: Meanwhile, finely dice the red onion and cut the cherry tomatoes into quarters.
steps.label: Dice onion, quarter tomatoes
steps.notes: Inferred duration. Performed 'Meanwhile' during baking.

steps.label: Roughly chop coriander leaves
steps.notes: Inferred duration. Performed 'Meanwhile' during baking.

steps.raw_text: Add a few tablespoons of the enchilada sauce to the bottom of your baking tray along with a splash of water to provide a very shallow layer of liquid...
steps.label: Add sauce and water to tray
steps.notes: Inferred duration.

steps.raw_text: Place into a small bowl and toss in a little extra virgin olive oil, sea salt and a squeeze of fresh lime. This is your cherry tomato salsa.
steps.label: Toss salsa ingredients
steps.notes: Inferred duration. Performed 'Meanwhile' during baking.

steps.raw_text: Next spoon the enchilada filling down the middle of each tortilla wrap, roll them up and lay into your ovenproof dish. Repeat with the remaining wrap and arrange next to each other.
steps.label: Fill and roll tortilla wraps
steps.notes: Inferred duration.

steps.raw_text: Spoon the remaining reserved enchilada sauce over the top of the wraps. Give the cashew cheese sauce a good shake... then pour over the top of the enchiladas.
steps.label: Spoon reserved sauce, pour cashew cheese
steps.notes: Inferred duration.

steps.raw_text: Bake in the oven for 15-20 minutes or until the cheese sauce and the wrap have firmed up and turned golden. Check the enchiladas are piping hot in the centre before serving.
steps.label: Bake enchiladas until golden
steps.notes: Duration 15-20 minutes. Bake until cheese sauce and wrap have firmed up and turned golden. Check enchiladas are piping hot in the centre.

steps.raw_text: Once cooked, remove the enchiladas from the oven, spoon over your cherry tomato salsa, scatter over the fresh coriander and squeeze over the remaining fresh lime. Divide between serving plates and enjoy!
steps.label: Garnish enchiladas with salsa, coriander, lime
steps.notes: Inferred duration. Combines removing from oven, spooning salsa, scattering coriander, squeezing lime, and dividing for serving.

title: Crispy Black Pepper Tofu With Stir Fried Vegetables, Sticky Coconut Rice, Pak Choi & Sesame Seeds

steps.raw_text: Before you start, take out all the ingredients for this recipe (see picture above) and rinse any raw grains, herbs or vegetables.
steps.label: Gather ingredients and rinse produce
steps.notes: Inferred duration.

steps.raw_text: Take out a saucepan and a wok (recommended) or large frying pan.
steps.label: Gather cooking pans
steps.notes: Inferred duration. Wok or large frying pan are alternatives for the main stir-fry pan.

steps.raw_text: Tear the tofu into bitesized pieces with your hands, then place into a bowl
steps.label: Tear tofu into bitesized pieces
steps.notes: Inferred duration.

steps.raw_text: In the meantime, deseed the red pepper and cut it into bite-sized pieces.
steps.label: Deseed and cut red pepper
steps.notes: Inferred duration.

steps.raw_text: Peel the onion, trim the top and base, and cut it into bite-sized pieces as well.
steps.label: Peel and cut onion
steps.notes: Inferred duration.

steps.label: Finely slice spring onions
steps.notes: Inferred duration.

steps.raw_text: Slice the base off the pak choi stem and pull apart the leaves with your hands.
steps.label: Prepare pak choi leaves
steps.notes: Inferred duration.

steps.raw_text: Place the rice in your saucepan and cover with 2.5x its volume in water. Bring to the boil, then reduce the heat and cover. Allow to cook for 5 minutes
steps.label: Cook rice with water
steps.notes: Cook for 5 minutes after bringing to boil and covering.

steps.raw_text: Add a drizzle of a neutral oil (e.g. vegetable, sunflower or groundnut, but not olive oil) to your frying pan or wok and once hot
steps.label: Heat oil for tofu frying
steps.notes: Inferred duration. 'Once hot' implies preheating.

steps.raw_text: Place a frying pan over a medium heat and add a drizzle of oil. Once hot
steps.label: Heat pan for pak choi
steps.notes: Inferred duration. 'Once hot' implies preheating.

steps.raw_text: and toss through the cornflour until evenly coated.
steps.label: Toss tofu with cornflour
steps.notes: Inferred duration.

steps.raw_text: then stir through the desiccated coconut and continue cooking for a further 3-5 minutes or until tender but al dente.
steps.label: Stir in coconut, finish rice
steps.notes: Cook until tender but al dente. Duration range 3-5 minutes.

steps.raw_text: fry the pak choi until tender, around 3-5 minutes.
steps.label: Fry pak choi until tender
steps.notes: Duration range 3-5 minutes.

steps.raw_text: add the tofu and fry until golden and crunchy on all sides, around 10 minutes.
steps.label: Fry tofu until golden and crunchy
steps.notes: Fry until golden and crunchy on all sides.

steps.raw_text: Season to taste with soy or salt.
steps.label: Season pak choi to taste
steps.notes: Inferred duration.

steps.raw_text: Transfer to a bowl lined with kitchen towel.
steps.label: Transfer fried tofu to towel-lined bowl
steps.notes: Inferred duration.

steps.raw_text: Wipe the pan clean with a kitchen towel, then place it back on a medium-high heat.
steps.label: Clean frying pan for stir-fry
steps.notes: Inferred duration.

steps.raw_text: place it back on a medium-high heat. Once the oil is hot
steps.label: Heat pan for stir-fry
steps.notes: Inferred duration. 'Once the oil is hot' implies preheating.

steps.raw_text: add the prepared red pepper and onion, and stir-fry until softened and lightly browned.
steps.label: Stir-fry red pepper and onion
steps.notes: Inferred duration. Cook until softened and lightly browned.

steps.raw_text: Add the black pepper sauce and cook until simmering, about 2–3 minutes.
steps.label: Add black pepper sauce and simmer
steps.notes: Cook until simmering. Duration range 2-3 minutes.

steps.raw_text: Once the sauce is hot, return the tofu to the pan and stir through for 1–2 minutes, then remove from the heat.
steps.label: Return tofu to pan and stir through sauce
steps.notes: Duration range 1-2 minutes.

steps.raw_text: Serve the black pepper tofu alongside the coconut rice and charred pak choi.
steps.label: Serve black pepper tofu, coconut rice, and pak choi
steps.notes: Inferred duration.

steps.raw_text: Scatter over the spring onions and sesame seeds to garnish and enjoy!
steps.label: Garnish with spring onions and sesame seeds
steps.notes: Inferred duration.

title: Crispy Buffalo Tofu Tacos With Cooling Ranch Dressing, Shredded Cabbage & Juicy Pineapple

steps.raw_text: You may want to run the sauce pouch under warm water to loosen the texture before opening.
steps.label: Warm buffalo sauce pouch (optional)
steps.notes: Optional step to loosen sauce texture. Inferred duration.

steps.raw_text: Before you start, take out all the ingredients for this recipe (see picture above) and rinse any raw grains, herbs or vegetables.
steps.label: Take out ingredients, rinse produce
steps.notes: Inferred duration from recipe's stated 'Prep time'.

steps.raw_text: Add a drizzle of oil to your frying pan and place over a medium-high heat. Once hot,
steps.label: Heat frying pan with oil
steps.notes: Heat to 'medium-high heat'. Inferred duration.

steps.raw_text: Tear the tofu into bite-sized chunks with your hands
steps.label: Tear tofu into chunks
steps.notes: Inferred duration.

steps.raw_text: Meanwhile slice the red cabbage as thinly as you can (use a mandolin if you have one).
steps.label: Slice red cabbage thinly
steps.notes: Slice 'as thinly as you can'. Mandolin is optional. Inferred duration.

steps.label: Roughly chop coriander
steps.notes: Inferred duration.

steps.raw_text: Roughly chop the pineapple into smaller pieces.
steps.label: Roughly chop pineapple
steps.notes: Inferred duration.

steps.raw_text: Give the cashew ranch sauce a shake in its pouch before opening in case it has separated while sitting in the fridge.
steps.label: Shake cashew ranch sauce pouch
steps.notes: Inferred duration.

steps.raw_text: then place into a small bowl with the cornflour and season well with salt and pepper. Mix carefully with your hands to coat the tofu in the cornflour.
steps.label: Coat tofu with cornflour, season
steps.notes: Inferred duration.

steps.raw_text: add the tofu and fry on all sides until golden and crispy. Alternatively, toss in a little oil and air fry for 15 minutes, tossing every 5 minutes.
steps.label: Fry tofu until golden and crispy
steps.notes: Fry on all sides until golden and crispy. Air fry alternative is 15 minutes. Inferred duration for pan-frying.

steps.raw_text: When the tofu is ready, remove it from the pan and place it into a bowl
steps.label: Remove tofu from pan
steps.notes: Inferred duration.

steps.raw_text: Wipe your frying pan clean with some kitchen towel,
steps.label: Wipe frying pan clean
steps.notes: Inferred duration.

steps.raw_text: and toss with the buffalo sauce to coat evenly.
steps.label: Toss tofu with buffalo sauce
steps.notes: Requires warming sauce if step-10 was performed. Inferred duration.

steps.raw_text: then dry-fry the tacos (without oil) for 10–20 seconds on each side, or until warm and soft. Add a sprinkle of water if you’d like them extra soft.
steps.label: Dry-fry tacos until warm, soft
steps.notes: Fry for '10–20 seconds on each side'. Total duration 20-40 seconds, rounded up to 1 minute. Add water for extra softness.

steps.raw_text: Divide the tacos between serving plates,
steps.label: Divide tacos between serving plates
steps.notes: Inferred duration.

steps.raw_text: then pile up with the crispy buffalo tofu, a drizzle of cashew ranch sauce, the red cabbage and pineapple.
steps.label: Pile tacos with tofu, ranch, cabbage, pineapple
steps.notes: Inferred duration.

steps.raw_text: Finish with a scattering of coriander to garnish and enjoy!
steps.label: Garnish tacos with coriander
steps.notes: Inferred duration.

title: Mac & Greens With Tenderstem Broccoli, Crispy Kale & Mezzi Rigatoni In A Creamy Cashew Sauce

steps.label: Preheat oven
steps.notes: Preheat to 180°C / 160°C fan. Duration inferred.

steps.raw_text: take out a large saucepan and a large baking tray.
steps.label: Take out equipment
steps.notes: Duration inferred.

steps.label: Boil kettle
steps.notes: Duration inferred.

steps.raw_text: take out all the ingredients for this recipe
steps.label: Take out all ingredients
steps.notes: Duration inferred.

steps.raw_text: Meanwhile pour boiling water from your kettle into your other saucepan and place over a high heat.
steps.label: Pour boiling water into saucepan
steps.notes: Place over high heat. Duration inferred.

steps.raw_text: rinse any raw grains, herbs or vegetables.
steps.label: Rinse raw vegetables
steps.notes: Duration inferred.

steps.raw_text: Once boiling add the mezzi rigatoni and cook until al dente, around 12 minutes.
steps.label: Cook mezzi rigatoni until al dente
steps.notes: Cook for around 12 minutes.

steps.raw_text: Remove any hardy stems from the green kale and then roughly chop the leaves.
steps.label: Prep kale leaves
steps.notes: Remove hardy stems and roughly chop leaves. Duration inferred.

steps.raw_text: Cut the broccoli into bite-sized pieces
steps.label: Cut broccoli into pieces
steps.notes: Duration inferred.

steps.raw_text: Drain the pasta and set aside to keep warm.
steps.label: Drain pasta and set aside
steps.notes: Set aside to keep warm. Duration inferred.

steps.raw_text: place into your roasting tray, toss in a little olive oil and season well with salt and pepper.
steps.label: Season broccoli for roasting
steps.notes: Duration inferred.

steps.raw_text: Place the same saucepan you used for your pasta back over a low-medium heat
steps.label: Place saucepan over low-medium heat
steps.notes: Use the same saucepan as for pasta. Duration inferred.

steps.label: Roast broccoli for 10 minutes
steps.notes: Roast at 180°C / 160°C fan.

steps.raw_text: and pour in the cashew 'cheese' sauce.
steps.label: Pour in cashew 'cheese' sauce
steps.notes: Duration inferred.

steps.raw_text: then add the kale with a little olive oil and seasoning tossed through
steps.label: Season kale for roasting
steps.notes: Add kale to the baking tray after the initial broccoli roast. Duration inferred.

steps.label: Heat cashew sauce through
steps.notes: Heat for 1-2 minutes.

steps.raw_text: and roast everything for a further 5 minutes.
steps.label: Roast broccoli and kale
steps.notes: Roast everything for a further 5 minutes at 180°C / 160°C fan.

steps.label: Remove saucepan from heat
steps.notes: Duration inferred.

steps.raw_text: and stir through the pasta and half of the broccoli and kale.
steps.label: Stir pasta and half greens
steps.notes: Stir through the pasta and half of the broccoli and kale. Duration inferred.

steps.raw_text: Divide the pasta between serving bowls
steps.label: Divide pasta into serving bowls
steps.notes: Duration inferred.

steps.raw_text: and garnish with the remaining broccoli and kale.
steps.label: Garnish with remaining greens
steps.notes: Duration inferred.

steps.raw_text: Season to taste with salt and pepper, and enjoy!
steps.label: Season and enjoy
steps.notes: Season to taste. Duration inferred.
